rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a welcoming and spacious layout designed for wheelchair accessibility, featuring non-slip flooring and gentle ramps.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living space with natural light, Scandinavian minimalist design, and ample seating area.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Functional dining space with minimalist Scandinavian aesthetics, ensuring smooth flow from the living area.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Scandinavian kitchen designed for functionality with accessible work surfaces and wheelchair-friendly layout.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace with ample natural light, ergonomic design and Scandinavian simplicity.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Cozy library area with built-in shelves, Scandinavian decor and ample space for reading and relaxation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom designed with safety features including grab bars and non-slip tiles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with Scandinavian minimalist design, ample storage and natural light from strategically placed windows.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: North-facing balcony designed for relaxation and enjoying natural views, accessible via a ramp.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose storage area designed to house cleaning supplies and household essentials.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible front door with a ramp, located on the north side for Vastu compliance.
Large window adjacent to living room to maximize natural light and ventilation while maintaining Scandinavian simplicity.
Dining window to provide ample daylight in the dining area, ensuring a bright and inviting space.
Office window offering natural light, fostering a productive working environment.
